DOC.brief_title: Monotherapy Versus Placebo Over 10 Days Integrase Naive HIV-1 Infected Adults
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Documented HIV1 infection screen viral load 5000 300,000 copies/mL . Baseline CD4 cell count great 100 . Females must nonchildbearing potential Not receive antiretroviral therapy 12 week prior first dose . Exclusion criterion : Must infect hepatitis B C. Patients must acute laboratory abnormality . Must active CDC ( Centers Disease Control Prevention ) Category C disease ( 1993 ) , except cutaneous Kaposi 's sarcoma require systemic therapy trial .
